DOC.brief_summary: Purpose study evaluate stem cell expression ( SCE ) endometriotic ( E ) non endometriotic ovarian endometrial tissue .
DOC.brief_title: Edessy Stem Cell Score ( ESS ) , Endometrium , Endometrioma
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct 40 woman Al-Azhar University Hospitals . They divide two equal group , group 1 ovarian endometrioma group 2 normal ovary . Ovarian endometrial sample evaluate hematoxlin & eosin histopathology ( HP ) oct-4 immunohistochemistry ( IH ) SCE . Evaluation IH parameter reveal important factor evaluate SC arrange score ( Edessy Stem Cell Score=ESS ) .
DOC.criteria: 20 40 year receive hormonal treatment three month Diabetes mellitus , cardiovascular kidney disease , adenomyosis , Uterine fibroid Endometrial carcinoma Poly cystic ovary
